content: hi @Charlotte Aten did you manage to get a consensus for meeting tomorrow? Can you or Jeremie send a link, please? Otherwise I can send one, if we have quorum. Thanks!

Valeria de Paiva said:

hi Charlotte Aten did you manage to get a consensus for meeting tomorrow? Can you or Jeremie send a link, please? Otherwise I can send one, if we have quorum. Thanks!

I believe the consensus was tomorrow (Thursday, June 16) at 11am Pacific time. I created a meeting at https://rochester.zoom.us/j/96305264877 but if J√©r√©mie wants to create a different one in order to record to Yale's system instead then that works too.
Great! your zoom is fine, I guess I missed the message with the link, thanks!
I'll be a few minutes late, apologies!
Thanks for a great meeting and for letting me know what happened in the Beaver Hollow!
For sure, it was really great getting to reconnect! Thanks @Nelson Niu for volunteering to organize the meeting later this year, I'm looking forward to it.
